metadata.title: CVE-2016-7166 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libarchive before 3.2.0 does not limit the number of recursivedecompressions, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption and application crash) via a crafted gzip file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3').
